data.name: Dedicated_staffs_to_provide_assistance
data.value: Dedicated staffs to provide assistance. Need technical support or a friend to play with? We are here for you!

data.name: Discover_fun_unique
data.value: Discover fun, unique and innovative games from up-and-coming developers!

data.name: Share_PlayToken_Token_with_your_friends
data.value: Share PlayToken Token with your friends and loved ones, and empower them with the freedom to upgrade whichever games they like to play ♥

data.name: Get_special_deals_best_price
data.value: Get special deals, best price for in-game items and exclusive content only available to our GToken members.

data.name: Register_your_account_now
data.value: Register your account now to get free Play Token and start playing today!

data.name: We_hope_to_bring_happiness
data.value: We hope to bring happiness and share the joy with you

data.name: Call_our_support_agent
data.value: Call our support agent and get your answer immediately.

data.name: Easy_simple_no_credit_card
data.value: Easy & simple, no credit card needed

data.name: PlayToken_Token_is_a_digital_currency_platform
data.value: PlayToken is a digital currency platform for mobile games that delivers greater choices, convenience and simplicity to our customers in all that we do.We seek out popular and quality games to introduce to our users. We reward our users who achieve VIP status with loyalty rewards, which can be used to redeem exclusive and limited edition items for the games you play.

data.name: GToken_is_a_gateway_to_play
data.value: GToken is a gateway to play: when you play, you get happiness. We hope to bring happiness and share the joy with your friends and loved ones when you play with us.

data.name: Our_customer_support_team
data.value: Our customer support team are happy to answer your questions

data.name: We_provide_our_undivided_attention
data.value: We provide our undivided attention and support to our users who requires help and attention, be it regarding a technical issue, advice on how to clear a stage you are stuck with, or even a gaming companion when you wish to find someone you can play with. PlayToken is a gateway to play: when you play, you get happiness. We hope to bring happiness and share the joy with your friends and loved ones when you play with us.

data.name: We_will_get_back_to_you_shortly
data.value: We will get back to you shortly.

data.value: Get to know more about us

data.value: PlayToken is a gateway to play: when you play, you get happiness. We hope to bring happiness and share the joy with your friends and loved ones when you play with us.

data.name: Share_Play_Token
data.value: Share Play Token with your friends and loved ones, and empower them with the freedom to upgrade whichever games they like to play

data.name: GToken_believes_that_gaming_is_about_connecting_people
data.value: GToken believes that gaming is about connecting people and having fun, so we've committed ourselves to build lifestyle clubs all over SEA that are free to use for our members and friends, where people can hang out with like-minded people, connect to high-speed internet wifi, enjoy free refreshments while playing games and chilling out in a conducive environment.

data.value: Where you share Happiness playing Together

data.value: After this, there is no turning back.

data.value: No results were returned for that query

data.name: Hang_on_our_server_is_crunching_
data.value: Hang on! Our server is crunching your order!

data.name: For_Play_For_Happiness_For_People
data.value: For Play For Happiness For People

data.name: if_you_have_any_questions
data.value: if you have any questions or concerns. Please be sure to forward this email as well to expedite processing of your request.

data.name: Assignment_description
data.value: You may not transfer or assign any rights or obligations you have under this Agreement without PlayToken’s prior written consent. PlayToken reserves the right to transfer or assign this Agreement or any right or obligation under this Agreement at any time.

data.name: Balances_description
data.value: You do not need to maintain a Balance in your PlayToken account in order to possess a PlayToken account. If there is a Balance in your PlayToken account, it will expire in 365 days pending on the date when the Play Tokens has been purchased and charged into the PlayToken account.

data.name: Charging_Limits_description
data.value: We may, at our discretion, impose limits on the amount of Play Tokens you can charge into your PlayToken account.

data.name: Charging_of_Play_Tokens_to_your_PlayToken_account
data.value: 3.1 Charging of Play Tokens to your PlayToken account.

data.name: Charging_of_Play_Tokens_to_your_PlayToken_account_description
data.value: Users are to charge their Play Tokens into personal or authorize PlayToken which is registered having abided by the User Agreement. PlayToken will not be held responsible and/or carry out rectification should we deem that the Play Tokens are charged misappropriated or by errors resulting from Users misapplication during charging process or practices.

data.name: Default_Transaction_Sources_description
data.value: When you make a payment, Play Tokens will be deducted from your registered PlayToken account directly. If there are insufficient Play Tokens in your PlayToken account, transaction will be denied.

data.name: Dormant_PlayToken_account_description
data.value: PlayToken will not close any dormant PlayToken account for indefinite period. Play Tokens left in Balance will expire in 365 days pending on the date when the Play Tokens has been purchased and charged into the PlayToken account.

data.name: Eligibility_and_Verification_description
data.value: You authorize PlayToken, directly or through third parties, to make any inquiries we consider necessary to validate your identity. This may include asking you for further information, requiring you to take steps to confirm ownership of your email address and verifying your Information against third party databases or through other sources.

data.name: How_to_Close_Your_PlayToken_account
data.value: 5.1 How to Close Your PlayToken account.

data.name: How_to_Close_Your_PlayToken_account_description
data.value: Upon registration for a PlayToken account, Users will not be allowed to close their PlayToken account. PlayToken will exercise discretion in maintaining and making available of information of the PlayToken account for investigation if any. Users may however make limited changes to specific PlayToken account particulars deem non-conflicting with the Privacy Policies and Users Agreement subjected to approval of PlayToken at sole discretion. Should a PlayToken account be terminated on basis of special circumstances, User of the terminated PlayToken account will remain liable for all obligations related to the PlayToken account even after it is closed.

data.name: Intellectual_Property_description
data.value: "PlayToken.com", "PlayToken", and all related logos, products and services described in our website are either trademarks or registered trademarks of PlayToken. You may not copy, imitate or use them without PlayToken prior written consent. In addition, all page headers, custom graphics, button icons, and scripts are service marks, trademarks, and/or trade dress of PlayToken. You may not alter, modify or change these HTML logos in any way, use them in a manner that is disparaging to PlayToken or the Service or display them in any manner that implies PlayToken’s sponsorship or endorsement.

data.name: Merchant_Processing_Delay_description
data.value: When you send a payment to certain merchants, you are providing an Authorization to the merchant to process your payment and complete the transaction. The payment will be held as pending until the merchant processes your payment. Some merchants may delay processing your payment. In such an instance, your Authorization will remain valid for up to 30 Days.

data.name: Notices_to_You_description
data.value: You agree that PlayToken may provide notice to you by posting it on our website or emailing it to the email address listed in your PlayToken Profile. PlayToken reserves the right to close your PlayToken account if you withdraw your consent to receive electronic communications.

data.name: Privacy_of_Others_description
data.value: If you receive Information about another PlayToken User through the Service, you must keep the Information confidential and only use it in connection with the Service. You may not disclose or distribute a PlayToken User's Information to a third party or use the Information for marketing purposes unless you receive the User's express consent to do so.

data.name: Purchasing_using_Play_Tokens_description
data.value: Payment and transactions to participating merchants affiliated to PlayToken will be conducted solely between the PlayToken account holder of the PlayToken account and the transacting merchant. Payment in form of Play Tokens will be deducted from the participating User’s PlayToken account as and when the transaction is successful. Refer to 3.4 should the Transaction be refused.

data.name: Refund_Policy_description
data.value: All unused balances are not refundable nor returnable.

data.name: Refused_Transaction_description
data.value: When you conduct a transaction, the recipient is not required to accept it. You agree that you will not hold PlayToken liable for any damages resulting from a recipient's decision not to accept the transaction made through the Service.

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description
data.value: Restricted Activities. In connection with your use of our website, your PlayToken account, or the Services, or in the course of your interactions with PlayToken, a User or a third party, you will not:

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_a
data.value: (a) Breach this Agreement, the Users Agreement and any other Agreements that you have entered into with PlayToken (including a Policy);

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_b
data.value: (b) Violate any law, statute, ordinance, or regulation (for example, those governing financial services, consumer protections, unfair competition, anti-discrimination or false advertising);

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_c
data.value: (c) Infringe PlayToken or any third party's copyright, patent, trademark, trade secret or other intellectual property rights, or rights of publicity or privacy;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_e
data.value: (e) Provide false, inaccurate or misleading Information;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_f
data.value: (f) Send or receive what we reasonably believe to be potentially fraudulent funds;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_g
data.value: (g) Refuse to cooperate in an investigation or provide confirmation of your identity or any Information you provide to us;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_h
data.value: (h) Attempt to "double dip" during the course of a dispute by receiving or attempting to receive funds from both PlayToken and Merchants for the same transaction.

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_j
data.value: (j) Control a PlayToken account that is linked to another PlayToken account that has engaged in any of these Restricted Activities.

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_k
data.value: (k) Conduct your business or use the Services in a manner that results in or may result in complaints,

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_l
data.value: (l) Use your PlayToken account or the Services in a manner that PlayToken, reasonably believe to be an abuse of the PlayToken system or a violation of E-Payment and billing solutions.

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_m
data.value: (m) Access the Services from a country that is not included on PlayToken permitted countries list.

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_n
data.value: (n) Disclose or distribute another User's Information to a third party, or use the Information for marketing purposes unless you receive the User's express consent to do so;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_o
data.value: (o) Send unsolicited email to a User or use the Services to collect payments for sending, or assisting in sending, unsolicited email to third parties;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_p
data.value: (p) Take any action that imposes an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on our infrastructure;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_q
data.value: (q) Facilitate any viruses, Trojan horses, worms or other computer programming routines that may damage, detrimentally interfere with, surreptitiously intercept or expropriate any system, data or Information;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_r
data.value: (r) Use any robot, spider, other automatic device, or manual process to monitor or copy our website without our prior written permission;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_s
data.value: (s) Use any device, software or routine to bypass our robot exclusion headers, or interfere or attempt to interfere, with our website or the Services;

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_t
data.value: (t) Take any action that may cause us to lose any of the services from our internet service providers, payment processors, or other suppliers.

data.name: Termination_of_PlayToken_account_description
data.value: Should a PlayToken account be terminated in relation to clause 5.1, 6 & 7, there will be no refund of Play Tokens given or provided to the involved, User or third parties.

data.name: User_agreement_description
data.value: This Agreement is a contract between you and PlayToken and applies to your use of PlayToken’s Services. You must read, agree with and accept all of the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement. We may amend this Agreement at any time by posting a revised version on our website. The revised version will be effective at the time we post it. We last modified this Agreement on 24th March 2015.

data.name: Your_Privacy_description
data.value: Protecting your privacy is very important to PlayToken. Please review our Privacy Policy in order to better understand our commitment to maintaining your privacy, as well as our use and disclosure of your Information.

data.name: Complete_Agreement_description
data.value: This Agreement sets forth the entire understanding between you and PlayToken with respect to the Service. Sections 1, 7, 10 and 14, as well as any other terms which by their nature should survive, will survive the termination of this Agreement. If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable, such provision shall be struck and the remaining provisions shall be enforced.

data.name: Contact_PlayToken_First_description
data.value: If a dispute arises between you and PlayToken, will be glad to assist and direct your concerns to solving your problems. Such disputes encompass PlayToken Services only, non-related to Merchant Services. Disputes between you and PlayToken regarding our Services may be reported to Customer Service online.

data.name: Contact_the_Merchant_description
data.value: If a dispute arises between you and the Merchant regarding their goods and services, kindly approach the Merchant directly for advice. Should the dispute implicate PlayToken Services, we will assist in the solving the dispute with the Users and Merchants promptly.

data.name: Definition_description
data.value: With reference to the User Agreement:

data.name: Definition_description_PlayToken
data.value: • The company, GToken Pte Ltd providing E-payment solutions using Physical Scratch Cards as an alternative to conventional use of Credit Cards of Debit Cards.

data.name: Definition_description_PlayToken_account
data.value: • Users who intend to use PlayToken to make purchases online with related merchants must register a PlayToken account. Play Tokens charged into the PlayToken account can be used to make online payments. PlayToken account can be considered as an electronic online account.

data.name: Definition_description_Merchants
data.value: • Related Partners and Merchants can apply to PlayToken for the use of our online payment facilities to enhance and promote their products and services.

data.name: Definition_description_PlayTokens
data.value: • Play Tokens is a virtual credit used for transaction between the User of the PlayToken account and Merchants for online purchases. Play Tokens is operated solely and exclusively by GToken Ltd.

data.name: Errors_description_1
data.value: If we discover a processing error, we will rectify the error. If the error resulted in Play Tokens not deducted for a payment of service or goods, PlayToken will deduct the amount appropriately. If the error result in Play Tokens deducted but no goods or services received, PlayToken will investigate and advice the Merchant and User accordingly.

data.name: Errors_description_2
data.value: If the error resulted in our not completing a transaction on time or in the correct amount, rectify the situation promptly, unless:

data.name: Errors_description_2_a
data.value: (a) Through no fault of ours, you did not have enough available Play Tokens to complete the transaction,

data.name: Errors_description_2_b
data.value: (b) Our system was not working properly and you knew about the breakdown when you started the transaction, or

data.name: Errors_description_2_c
data.value: (c) Circumstances beyond our control (such as fire or flood or loss of Internet connection) prevented the transaction, despite our reasonable precautions.

data.name: PlayToken_is_only_a_Payment_Service_Provider
data.value: 1.1 PlayToken is only a Payment Service Provider.

data.name: PlayToken_is_only_a_Payment_Service_Provider_description
data.value: PlayToken helps you make payments to and accept payments from third parties. PlayToken is an independent contractor for all purposes, except that PlayToken acts as your agent only with respect to the custody of your virtual Play Tokens. PlayToken does not have control of or liability for the products or services that are paid for with our Service. We do not guarantee the identity of any User or ensure that a buyer or a seller will complete a transaction.

data.name: Identifying_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions_description
data.value: You can inspect your transaction history at any time by logging in to your PlayToken account on the PlayToken website and clicking the "History" tab. It is very important that you immediately notify PlayToken if you have reason to believe any of the following activities have occurred:

data.name: Identifying_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions_description_a
data.value: (a) There has been an unauthorized transaction from your PlayToken account;

data.name: Identifying_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions_description_b
data.value: (b) There has been an unauthorized access to your PlayToken account;

data.name: Identifying_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions_description_c
data.value: (c) Your password for your PlayToken account has been compromised;

data.name: Identifying_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions_description_d
data.value: (d) Someone has transferred or may transfer money using your PlayToken account without your permission.

data.name: Indemnification_description
data.value: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold PlayToken, its parent, officers, directors and employees harmless from any claim or demand (including attorneys' fees) made or incurred by any third party due to or arising out of your breach of this Agreement and/or your use of the Services.

data.name: Liability_Disclaimers_description_1
data.value: 7.1 The Material contained in this Web Site, (including text, images, graphics, links, sound files, animation files, video files or other items and their arrangement) are provided "as is", "as available". PlayToken does not warrant the accuracy, adequacy or completeness of these Materials.

data.name: Liability_Disclaimers_description_2
data.value: 7.2 No warranty of any kind, implied, expressed or statutory, including but not limited to the warranties of non-infringement of the third party's rights, title, satisfactory quality, merchantability, fitness for any particular purpose and freedom from any computer virus or other malicious, destructive or corrupting code, programmed or macro, is given in conjunction with the information and materials contained in or linked to PlayToken.

data.name: Liability_Disclaimers_description_3
data.value: 7.3 PlayToken may include publications with technical inaccuracies or typographical errors that will be corrected as they are discovered at PlayToken’s sole discretion. Also, changes are periodically added to the material contained herein. These corrections and changes may be incorporated into the Web Site at a later date. PlayToken may at any time make modifications, improvements and/or changes to these Terms and Conditions and the material (names, images, pictures, logo and icons) displayed on the Web Site or products and services referred to within, with or without notice. Advice received via this Web Site should not be relied upon for personal, legal or financial decisions and you should consult an appropriate professional for specific advice tailored to your situation.

data.name: Liability_Disclaimers_description_4
data.value: 7.4 PlayToken shall in no event be liable for any damages, loss or expense including without limitation, special damage, or consequential damage, or economic loss arising from or in connection with:

data.name: Liability_Disclaimers_description_4_a
data.value: (a) any access, use or the delay or inability to access or use of PlayToken Services, or reliance on the Materials and/or any other information contained related to PlayToken Services;

data.name: Liability_Disclaimers_description_4_b
data.value: (b) any system, server or connection failure, error, omission, interruption, delay in transmission, or computer failure;

data.name: Liability_Disclaimers_description_4_c
data.value: (c) any use of or access to any other web site linked to this PlayToken.com;

data.name: Liability_Disclaimers_description_4_d
data.value: (d) any services, products, information, date, software or other material obtained from this PlayToken.com or from any other web site linked to this Web Site.

data.name: Liability_for_Unauthorized_Transactions_description
data.value: Reimbursement of Play Tokens or Monies due to Improper PlayToken account Access related to your PlayToken account (Hacking, compromise of security, compromise of personal information) will not be entertained. PlayToken account holders will hold full responsibility to safeguarding the security of the individual’s PlayToken account.

data.name: Limitations_of_Liability_description
data.value: IN NO EVENT SHALL WE, OUR PARENT, EMPLOYEES OR OUR SUPPLIERS BE LIABLE FOR LOST PROFITS OR ANY SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH OUR WEB SITE, OUR SERVICE, OR THIS AGREEMENT (HOWEVER ARISING, INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OUR LIABILITY, AND THE LIABILITY OF OUR PARENT, EMPLOYEES AND SUPPLIERS, TO YOU OR ANY THIRD PARTIES IN ANY CIRCUMSTANCE IS LIMITED TO THE ACTUAL AMOUNT OF DIRECT DAMAGES.

data.name: Notifying_PlayToken_of_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions
data.value: 9.2 Notifying PlayToken of Errors and/or Unauthorized Transactions.

data.name: Notifying_PlayToken_of_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions_description
data.value: To notify us if you believe there has been or will be an error or unauthorized transaction on your PlayToken account contact us through customer support.

data.name: No_Waiver_description
data.value: Our failure to act with respect to a breach by you or others does not waive our right to act with respect to subsequent or similar breaches.

data.name: No_Warranty_description_1
data.value: PlayToken, OUR PARENT, EMPLOYEES AND OUR SUPPLIERS PROVIDE OUR SERVICES "AS IS" AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY OR CONDITION, EXPRESS, IMPLIED OR STATUTORY. PlayToken, OUR PARENT, EMPLOYEES AND OUR SUPPLIERS SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIM ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF TITLE, MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.

data.name: No_Warranty_description_2
data.value: PlayToken does not have any control over the products or services that are paid for with our Service and PlayToken cannot ensure that a buyer or a seller you are dealing with will actually complete the transaction.

data.name: No_Warranty_description_3
data.value: PlayToken does not guarantee continuous, uninterrupted or secure access to our Service, and operation of our site may be interfered with by numerous factors outside of our control.

data.name: No_Warranty_description_4
data.value: PlayToken will make reasonable efforts to ensure that requests and transaction involving the use of PlayToken Physical Scratch Cards and Merchants’ transaction mechanism (E-payments) involving PlayToken are processed in a timely manner but PlayToken makes no representations or warranties regarding the amount of time needed to complete processing because our Service is dependent upon many factors outside of our control, such as technical difficulties experienced by PlayToken’s Internet Providers, User’s Internet Providers as well as other online third parties involvement in internet functionality. Some countries do not allow the disclaimer of implied warranties, so the foregoing disclaimers may not apply to you. This paragraph gives you specific legal rights and you may also have other legal rights that vary from countries to countries.

data.name: Restricted_Activities_description_d
data.value: (d) Act in a manner that is defamatory, trade libellous, unlawfully threatening or unlawfully harassing;

data.name: Review_of_Reports_of_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions
data.value: 9.3 Review of Reports of Errors and/or Unauthorized Transactions.

data.name: Review_of_Reports_of_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions_description_1
data.value: We will advise you of the results of our investigation within 2 Business Days after we receive your notice. If we have made an error, we will correct it promptly. If we need more time, however, we may take up to 7 Days to investigate your complaint or question.

data.name: Review_of_Reports_of_Errors_and_or_Unauthorized_Transactions_description_2
data.value: At the end of our investigation, we will advise you of the results within 2 Business Days. If we determine that there was no error, we will send you a written explanation.

data.name: Your_Liability_Actions_We_May_Take
data.value: 8. Your Liability - Actions We May Take.

data.name: Your_Liability_Actions_We_May_Take_description_1
data.value: 8.1 Actions by PlayToken. If you engage in any Restricted Activities, we may take various actions to protect PlayToken, a User, a third party, or you from, Claims, fees, fines, penalties and any other liability. The actions we may take include but are not limited to the following:

data.name: Your_Liability_Actions_We_May_Take_description_1_a
data.value: (a) We may close, suspend, or limit your access to your PlayToken account or the Services (such as limiting access to any of your Play Tokens, and your ability to Charge Play Tokens, make purchases, or remove personal Information);

data.name: Your_Liability_Actions_We_May_Take_description_1_b
data.value: (b) We may update inaccurate Information you provided us;

data.name: Your_Liability_Actions_We_May_Take_description_1_c
data.value: (c) We may refuse to provide our Services to you in the future;

data.name: Your_Liability_Actions_We_May_Take_description_1_d
data.value: (d) We may take legal action against you.

data.name: Your_Liability_Actions_We_May_Take_description_2
data.value: 8.2 PlayToken, in its sole discretion, reserves the right to terminate this Agreement, access to its website, or access to the Service for any reason.

data.name: Your_Liability_Actions_We_May_Take_description_3
data.value: 8.3 PlayToken account Closure, Termination of Service, or Limited PlayToken account Access. If we close your PlayToken account or terminate your use of our Services for any reason, we will provide you with notice of our actions. If we limit access to your PlayToken account, we will provide you with notice of our actions and the opportunity to request restoration of access if appropriate.
